channel.title: Monte Carlo simulation on Andriy Koval
channel.description: Recent content in Monte Carlo simulation on Andriy Koval

item.title: Deriving Cut-off Scores for Significance Testing of NCDIF Indices Within the DFIT Framework Through Item Parameter Replication Method
item.description: investigated the properties of DIF indices in the differential functioning of items and tests (DFIT) framework and further tested the power of item parameter replication method (IPR) in identifying biased items within the item response theory (IRT) paradigm.
